docpx\Docblock¶

Docblock

Parses a PHP docblock returning its description and tags.

Methods¶

comment¶

comment($comment)

Parses a docblock comment into a readable array.

Parameters:$comment (string) – Docblock comment to parse.
Return type:array Array of results from the doc parsing.
